<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><font size="5">Most of ukrainian respondents take role iether <em>Data Scientist, Student or Software Engineer</em>. The role <em>Machine Learning Engineer</em> is occupied only by 14 people (7.53%)</font></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h1 id="Current-role-by-genders"><strong>Current role by genders</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#Current-role-by-genders">¶</a></h1>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><font size="5">On the chart below you can click different parts of it to explore allocation of gender, education level and current role. 
    <br>
    <br>For me interesting insights that women with <strong>BS degree</strong> either unemployed or work as a <em>Data Engineers</em>, whereas men with BS takes positions as <em>Data Scientists or Software Engineer</em> in addition.
    <br><br>Men and women with <strong>Doctoral degree</strong> mostly take roles as <em>Research Scientists and Data Scientists</em>.
    <br><br>Also, according to the data <strong>High school</strong> is enough for <em>Data Analyst</em> role in Ukraine.
    <br>
    <img src="https://miro.medium.com/max/740/1*1adquzfD-i4n1Z4ZGxlrtQ.jpeg" width="600" height="700">
    </font></p>
<!--     <img src="https://naked-science.ru/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Blackboard-with-algorithms-and-info.jpg" width="500" height="500"> -->
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [15]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">fig</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">px</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sunburst</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_ukraine</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">path</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Q2'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Q4'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Q5'</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Q2'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">color_discrete_map</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'Man'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'#0077b6'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Woman'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'#ffff3f'</span><span class="p">})</span>
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_layout</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">showlegend</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                  <span class="n">plot_bgcolor</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'white'</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                  <span class="n">margin</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nb">dict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">pad</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">),</span>
                  <span class="n">xaxis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'showticklabels'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">},</span>

                  <span class="n">yaxis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'categoryorder'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'total ascending'</span><span class="p">},</span>
                  <span class="n">title_text</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"<b>Distribution of roles by gender and education</b>"</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">title_x</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">font</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nb">dict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">family</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"serif"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">17</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'#000000'</span><span class="p">),</span>
                  <span class="n">title_font_size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">30</span><span class="p">)</span>

<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">experience</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span>
    <span class="n">data_ukraine</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Q6'</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">value_counts</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_frame</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">reset_index</span><span class="p">()</span>

          <span class="p">)</span>   

<span class="n">experience</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'percent'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">((</span><span class="n">experience</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">experience</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">round</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s1">'%'</span>
<span class="n">colors_experience</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'#014f86'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#2a6f97'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#2c7da0'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'#468faf'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#61a5c2'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#89c2d9'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#a9d6e5'</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">fig</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">go</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Figure</span><span class="p">(</span>
   <span class="n">go</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Bar</span><span class="p">(</span>
            <span class="n">x</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">experience</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Experience'</span><span class="p">],</span>
            <span class="n">y</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">experience</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">],</span>
            <span class="n">text</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">experience</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'percent'</span><span class="p">],</span>
            <span class="n">marker_color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">colors_experience</span><span class="p">))</span>

<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_traces</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">texttemplate</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'%</span><span class="si">{text}</span><span class="s1">'</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                  <span class="n">textposition</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'outside'</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">cliponaxis</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">hovertemplate</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'<b>Count</b>: %</span><span class="si">{y}</span><span class="s1"><extra></extra> '</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">textfont_size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">17</span><span class="p">)</span>
                  
    
<span class="n">experience_woman</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span>
    <span class="n">data_ukraine</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">data_ukraine</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Q2'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">==</span><span class="s1">'Woman'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s1">'Q6'</span><span class="p">]</span>

    <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_frame</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">reset_index</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rename</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'index'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'Experience'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Q6'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">})</span>
          <span class="p">)</span>  

<span class="n">experience_woman</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'percent'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">((</span><span class="n">experience_woman</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">experience_woman</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">round</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s1">'%'</span>
<span class="n">colors_woman</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'#FF7B00'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'#FF8800'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'#FF9500'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'#FFA200'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#FFAA00'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#FFB700'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'#FFC300'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#FFD000'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#FFDD00'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#FFEA00'</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">add_trace</span><span class="p">(</span>
   <span class="n">go</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Bar</span><span class="p">(</span>
            <span class="n">x</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">experience_woman</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Experience'</span><span class="p">],</span>
            <span class="n">y</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">experience_woman</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">],</span>
            <span class="n">text</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">experience_woman</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'percent'</span><span class="p">],</span>
            <span class="n">marker_color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">colors_woman</span><span class="p">))</span>

<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_traces</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">texttemplate</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'%</span><span class="si">{text}</span><span class="s1">'</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                  <span class="n">textposition</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'outside'</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">cliponaxis</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">hovertemplate</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'<b>Count</b>: %</span><span class="si">{y}</span><span class="s1"><extra></extra> '</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">textfont_size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">17</span><span class="p">)</span>


<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_xaxes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">showgrid</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_yaxes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">showgrid</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
 
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_layout</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">showlegend</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                  <span class="n">plot_bgcolor</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'white'</span><span class="p">,</span>

                  <span class="n">xaxis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'showticklabels'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">},</span>

<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><font size="5">From the chart above clearly that by average respondents have <em>2-5 years</em> of general experience in programming. Only 15 men and 1 woman have <em>10 to 20 years</em> of experience.</font></p>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><font size="5">As expected the most popular programming language is <em>Python</em>! But interesting that <em>R</em> is less popular in Data Science community in Ukraine then <em>Javascript</em>.
<br><br><img src="https://cdn.ucberkeleybootcamp.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/106/2020/12/tes_gen_blog_code6.jpg"></font></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h1 id="Most-recommended-language"><strong>Most recommended language</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#Most-recommended-language">¶</a></h1>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [19]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">language_recomended</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_ukraine</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Q8'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">value_counts</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_frame</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">reset_index</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rename</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'index'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'Languages'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Q8'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">})</span>
          <span class="p">)</span> 

<span class="n">fig</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">go</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Figure</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">go</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Pie</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">labels</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">language_recomended</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Languages'</span><span class="p">],</span> 
                             <span class="n">values</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">language_recomended</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">])])</span>

<span class="n">colors</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'#1c204b'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'#1f2354'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'#22275c'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'#252a64'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#282e6c'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#2b3175'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'#2f357d'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#323885'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#353c8d'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#383f95'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#3b439e'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#3e46a6'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#414aae'</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_traces</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">hoverinfo</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'percent+value'</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                  <span class="n">textinfo</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'label'</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                  <span class="n">textfont_size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">marker</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nb">dict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">colors</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">colors</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">line</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nb">dict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'white'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">width</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)))</span>

<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_layout</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">showlegend</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="c1">#                   title_text="<b>Recomended Languages Distribution</b>",</span>
                  <span class="n">title_x</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">font</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nb">dict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">family</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'serif'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'#000000'</span><span class="p">))</span>

<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">show</span><span class="p">()</span>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><font size="5">Totally agree with chart above. I use first three tools in my projects as well!
<br><br><img src="https://shwanoff.ru/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/images.png">
<img src="https://miro.medium.com/max/1200/1*dyNh2RVaforxssl3VR_PHA.png" width="500" height="400" >
<img src="data:image/png;base64,"  width="200" height="200"></font></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h1 id="What-type-of-computing-platform-do-data-scientists-use-most-often?"><strong>What type of computing platform do data scientists use most often?</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#What-type-of-computing-platform-do-data-scientists-use-most-often?">¶</a></h1>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><font size="5">Another one clickable chart use it to explore allocation of current role and what computational planform these people use.
<br><br>You can infer that <strong>cloud platforms</strong> mostly used by <em>Data Scientists</em> and <em>Research Scientist</em> then other roles.</font></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [22]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">data_ukraine</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Q11"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fillna</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"None"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">data_ukraine</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Q11'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">replace</span><span class="p">({</span>
    <span class="s1">'A laptop'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'Laptop'</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s1">'A personal computer / desktop'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'Desktop'</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s1">'A cloud computing platform (AWS, Azure, GCP, hosted notebooks, etc)'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'Cloud Computing'</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s1">'A deep learning workstation (NVIDIA GTX, LambdaLabs, etc)'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'DL workstation'</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s1">'None'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'Prefer not to answer'</span>
<span class="p">},</span> <span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>


<span class="n">fig</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">px</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sunburst</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_ukraine</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">path</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Q5'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Q11'</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Q5'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_layout</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">showlegend</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                  <span class="n">plot_bgcolor</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'white'</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                  <span class="n">margin</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nb">dict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">pad</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">),</span>
                  <span class="n">xaxis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'showticklabels'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">},</span>
                  <span class="n">yaxis_title</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">None</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">xaxis_title</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">None</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">yaxis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'categoryorder'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'total ascending'</span><span class="p">},</span>
                  <span class="n">title_text</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"<b>Types of computing platform</b>"</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">title_x</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">font</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nb">dict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">family</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"serif"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">17</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'#000000'</span><span class="p">),</span>
                  <span class="n">title_font_size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">30</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">show</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>

<h1 id="Which-types-of-specialized-hardware-do-data-scientists-in-Ukraine-use-on-a-regular-basis?"><strong>Which types of specialized hardware do data scientists in Ukraine use on a regular basis?</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#Which-types-of-specialized-hardware-do-data-scientists-in-Ukraine-use-on-a-regular-basis?">¶</a></h1>
</div>

<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q12</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_ukraine</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">52</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="mi">58</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">describe</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">T</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'count'</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_frame</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">reset_index</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rename</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'index'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'HW'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'count'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">})</span>
          <span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">data_ukraine_q12</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'HW'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">replace</span><span class="p">({</span>
    <span class="s1">'Q12_Part_1'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'NVIDIA GPUs'</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s1">'Q12_Part_2'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'Google Cloud TPUs'</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s1">'Q12_Part_3'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'AWS Trainium Chips'</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s1">'Q12_Part_4'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'AWS Inferentia Chips'</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s1">'Q12_Part_5'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'None'</span><span class="p">,</span>

<span class="p">},</span> <span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">data_ukraine_q12</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'percent'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[((</span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q12</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">data_ukraine_q12</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">round</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s1">'%'</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">)]</span>
<span class="n">data_ukraine_q12</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sort_values</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">ascending</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">colors</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'#1c204b'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'#1f2354'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'#22275c'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'#252a64'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#282e6c'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#2b3175'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'#2f357d'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#323885'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#353c8d'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#383f95'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#3b439e'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#3e46a6'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#414aae'</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">fig</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">go</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Figure</span><span class="p">(</span>
   <span class="n">go</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Bar</span><span class="p">(</span>
            <span class="n">x</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q12</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'HW'</span><span class="p">],</span>
            <span class="n">y</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q12</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">],</span>
            <span class="n">text</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q12</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'percent'</span><span class="p">],</span>
            <span class="n">marker_color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">colors</span><span class="p">))</span>

<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_traces</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">texttemplate</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'%</span><span class="si">{text}</span><span class="s1">'</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                  <span class="n">textposition</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'outside'</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">cliponaxis</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">hovertemplate</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'<b>Count</b>: %</span><span class="si">{y}</span><span class="s1"><extra></extra> '</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">textfont_size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">17</span><span class="p">)</span>


<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_xaxes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">showgrid</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_yaxes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">showgrid</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
 
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_layout</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">showlegend</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                  <span class="n">plot_bgcolor</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'white'</span><span class="p">,</span>

                  <span class="n">xaxis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'showticklabels'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">},</span>
                  <span class="n">yaxis_title</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">None</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">xaxis_title</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">None</span><span class="p">,</span>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><font size="5">It is plain to see ukrainians have around <em>3-4 years</em> in applying Machine Learning algorithms! And girls pretty much on the same level with boys. Amazing!</font></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><font size="5">On the sunburst chart below you can explore relation of current role an years of experience in applying ML. Have fun!</font></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [26]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">fig</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">px</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sunburst</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_ukraine</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">path</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Q2'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'Q5'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Q15'</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Q2'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">color_discrete_map</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'Man'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'#0077b6'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Woman'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'#ffff3f'</span><span class="p">})</span>
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_layout</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">showlegend</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                  <span class="n">plot_bgcolor</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'white'</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                  <span class="n">margin</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nb">dict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">pad</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">),</span>
                  <span class="n">xaxis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'showticklabels'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">},</span>
                  <span class="n">yaxis_title</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">None</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">xaxis_title</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">None</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">yaxis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'categoryorder'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'total ascending'</span><span class="p">},</span>
                  <span class="n">title_text</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"<b>Relation between current role and years of experience</b>"</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">title_x</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">font</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nb">dict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">family</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"serif"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">17</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'#000000'</span><span class="p">),</span>
                  <span class="n">title_font_size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">30</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">show</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>

<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h1 id="Machine-learning-frameworks"><strong>Machine learning frameworks</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#Machine-learning-frameworks">¶</a></h1>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><font size="5">There are a lot of different frameworks. It is no need to argue which one is better or worse. They are all good for their stuff! <br><br>I really enjoy doing deep learning using <em>PyTorch</em> lately :)</font></p>

</div>
</div>

    <span class="s1">'Q16_Part_16'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'Huggingface'</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s1">'Q16_Part_17'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'None'</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s1">'Q16_OTHER'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'Other'</span>
<span class="p">},</span> <span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">data_ukraine_q16</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'percent'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[((</span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q16</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">data_ukraine_q16</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">round</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s1">'%'</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">17</span><span class="p">)]</span>
<span class="n">data_ukraine_q16</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sort_values</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">ascending</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>

          <span class="s1">'#2c7da0'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'#468faf'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#61a5c2'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#89c2d9'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#a9d6e5'</span><span class="p">]</span>

   <span class="n">go</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Bar</span><span class="p">(</span>
            <span class="n">x</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q16</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Libs'</span><span class="p">],</span>
            <span class="n">y</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q16</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">],</span>
            <span class="n">text</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q16</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'percent'</span><span class="p">],</span>
            <span class="n">marker_color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">colors</span><span class="p">))</span>

</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><font size="5">The same for algorithms. They are all good for their stuff! But the most popular in Ukraine are <em>Regression</em> and <em>Decission Trees</em>. CNNs and Transformers also have their positions. It's cool!</font></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>

          <span class="p">)</span> 

<span class="n">data_ukraine_q27</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q27</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">data_ukraine_q27</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q27</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">],</span>
                      <span class="n">data_ukraine_q27</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">8</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">data_ukraine_q27</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">9</span><span class="p">],],</span> <span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">data_ukraine_q27</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'CC'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">replace</span><span class="p">({</span>

<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><font size="5">Not all cloud computing platforms are present in Ukrainian respondents' answers, so, <em>AWS</em> and <em>GCP</em> are the most popular in Ukraine.
<br><br><img src="data:image/png;base64,">
<img src="https://www.gstatic.com/devrel-devsite/prod/v7824338a80ec44166704fb131e1860a66ed443b0ce02adfe8171907535d63bde/cloud/images/social-icon-google-cloud-1200-630.png" width="500"></font></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><font size="5">The full list of managed machine learning products that were proposed in survey looks as follows:
<br> <br>  Amazon SageMaker
<br>  Azure Machine Learning Studio
<br>  Google Cloud Vertex AI
<br>  DataRobot
<br>  Databricks
<br>  Dataiku
<br>  Alteryx
<br>  Rapidminer
<br>  No / None
<br>  Other
<br> <br> Dataiku, Alteryx, Rapidminer are out of interest among Ukrainian data scientists. <br><br>Besides, not a lot of people really use some managed ML products, but still, <em>Amazon SageMaker</em> has some popularity.</font></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [36]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q31A</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_ukraine</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">155</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="mi">165</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">describe</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">T</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'count'</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_frame</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">reset_index</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rename</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'index'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'managed'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'count'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">})</span>
          <span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">data_ukraine_q31A</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q31A</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">data_ukraine_q31A</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q31A</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">],</span>
                        <span class="n">data_ukraine_q31A</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">9</span><span class="p">]],</span> <span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">data_ukraine_q31A</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'managed'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">replace</span><span class="p">({</span>
    <span class="s1">'Q31_A_Part_1'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'Amazon SageMaker'</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s1">'Q31_A_Part_2'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'Azure Machine Learning Studio'</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s1">'Q31_A_Part_3'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'Google Cloud Vertex AI'</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s1">'Q31_A_Part_4'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'DataRobot'</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s1">'Q31_A_Part_5'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'Databricks'</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s1">'Q31_A_Part_9'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'None'</span>
<span class="p">},</span> <span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">data_ukraine_q31A</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'percent'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[((</span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q31A</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">data_ukraine_q31A</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">round</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s1">'%'</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">)]</span>
<span class="n">data_ukraine_q31A</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sort_values</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">ascending</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">colors</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'#1c204b'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'#1f2354'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'#22275c'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'#252a64'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#282e6c'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#2b3175'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'#2f357d'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#323885'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#353c8d'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#383f95'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#3b439e'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#3e46a6'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#414aae'</span><span class="p">]</span>


<span class="n">fig</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">go</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Figure</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">go</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Bar</span><span class="p">(</span>
            <span class="n">x</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q31A</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">],</span>
            <span class="n">y</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q31A</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'managed'</span><span class="p">],</span>
            <span class="n">text</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q31A</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'percent'</span><span class="p">],</span>
            <span class="n">orientation</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'h'</span><span class="p">,</span>
            <span class="n">marker_color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">colors</span>
                        <span class="p">))</span>

<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_traces</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">texttemplate</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'%</span><span class="si">{text}</span><span class="s1">'</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                  <span class="n">textposition</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'outside'</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">cliponaxis</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">hovertemplate</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'<b>Count</b>: %</span><span class="si">{x}</span><span class="s1"><extra></extra> '</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">textfont_size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">17</span><span class="p">)</span>
                  
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_xaxes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">showgrid</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_yaxes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">showgrid</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
 
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_layout</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">showlegend</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                  <span class="n">plot_bgcolor</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'white'</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                  <span class="n">margin</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nb">dict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">pad</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">),</span>
                  <span class="n">xaxis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'showticklabels'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">},</span>
                  <span class="n">yaxis_title</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">None</span><span class="p">,</span>

                  <span class="n">title_text</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"<b>Managed ML products</b>"</span><span class="p">,</span>

<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><font size="5">Sadly, but not a lot of professionals from Ukraine use any automated machine learning tools.<br>I used albumentations a few times:)</font></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [42]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q36A</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_ukraine</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">205</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="mi">213</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">describe</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">T</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'count'</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_frame</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">reset_index</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rename</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'index'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'AutoML'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'count'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">})</span>
          <span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">data_ukraine_q36A</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q36A</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">data_ukraine_q36A</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">]],</span> <span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">data_ukraine_q36A</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'AutoML'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">replace</span><span class="p">({</span>
    <span class="s1">'Q36_A_Part_1'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'Automated data augmentation (e.g. imgaug, albumentations)'</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s1">'Q36_A_Part_2'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'Automated feature engineering/selection (e.g. tpot, boruta_py)'</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s1">'Q36_A_Part_3'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'Automated model selection (e.g. auto-sklearn, xcessiv)'</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s1">'Q36_A_Part_5'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'Automated hyperparameter tuning (e.g. hyperopt, ray.tune, Vizier)'</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s1">'Q36_A_Part_6'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'Automation of full ML pipelines (e.g. Google AutoML, H2O Driverless AI)'</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s1">'Q36_A_Part_7'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'No'</span>
<span class="p">},</span> <span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">data_ukraine_q36A</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'percent'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[((</span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q36A</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">data_ukraine_q36A</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">round</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s1">'%'</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">)]</span>
<span class="n">data_ukraine_q36A</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sort_values</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">ascending</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">colors</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'#323885'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#353c8d'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#383f95'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#3b439e'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#3e46a6'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#414aae'</span><span class="p">]</span>


<span class="n">fig</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">go</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Figure</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">go</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Bar</span><span class="p">(</span>
            <span class="n">x</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q36A</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">],</span>
            <span class="n">y</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q36A</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'AutoML'</span><span class="p">],</span>
            <span class="n">text</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q36A</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'percent'</span><span class="p">],</span>
            <span class="n">orientation</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'h'</span><span class="p">,</span>
            <span class="n">marker_color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">colors</span>
                        <span class="p">))</span>

<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_traces</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">texttemplate</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'%</span><span class="si">{text}</span><span class="s1">'</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                  <span class="n">textposition</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'outside'</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">cliponaxis</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">hovertemplate</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'<b>Count</b>: %</span><span class="si">{x}</span><span class="s1"><extra></extra> '</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">textfont_size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">17</span><span class="p">)</span>
                  
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_xaxes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">showgrid</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_yaxes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">showgrid</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
 
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_layout</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">showlegend</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                  <span class="n">plot_bgcolor</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'white'</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                  <span class="n">margin</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nb">dict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">pad</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">),</span>
                  <span class="n">xaxis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'showticklabels'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">},</span>
                  <span class="n">yaxis_title</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">None</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">xaxis_title</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">None</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">yaxis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'categoryorder'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'total ascending'</span><span class="p">},</span>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">

            <span class="n">x</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q42</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">],</span>
            <span class="n">y</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q42</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'media'</span><span class="p">],</span>
            <span class="n">text</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q42</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'percent'</span><span class="p">],</span>

                        <span class="p">))</span>

                  <span class="n">textfont_size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">17</span><span class="p">)</span>
                  
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_xaxes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">showgrid</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_yaxes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">showgrid</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
 
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_layout</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">showlegend</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h1 id="In-what-industry-is-your-current-employer/contract?"><strong>In what industry is your current employer/contract?</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#In-what-industry-is-your-current-employer/contract?">¶</a></h1><h2 id="What-is-the-size-of-the-company-where-you-are-employed?"><strong>What is the size of the company where you are employed?</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#What-is-the-size-of-the-company-where-you-are-employed?">¶</a></h2><h3 id="How-many-individuals-are-responsible-for-data-science-workloads-at-your-place-of-business?"><strong>How many individuals are responsible for data science workloads at your place of business?</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#How-many-individuals-are-responsible-for-data-science-workloads-at-your-place-of-business?">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [51]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">data_ukraine</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Q20"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fillna</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"No answer"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">data_ukraine</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Q21"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fillna</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"No answer"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">data_ukraine</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Q22"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fillna</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"No answer"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>

<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">

<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [52]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q20</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_ukraine</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Q20'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">value_counts</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_frame</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">reset_index</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rename</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'index'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'industry'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Q20'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">})</span>
          <span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">data_ukraine_q20</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'percent'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">((</span><span class="n">data_ukraine_q20</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">data_ukraine_q20</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">round</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s1">'%'</span>

          <span class="s1">'#2c7da0'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'#468faf'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#61a5c2'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#89c2d9'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#a9d6e5'</span><span class="p">]</span>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><font size="5">Yet another one clickable sunburst plot! Feel free to investigate how size of Data Science Team depends on company size and industry :)</font></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [53]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">fig</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">px</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sunburst</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_ukraine</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">path</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Q20'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'Q21'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Q22'</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Q20'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_layout</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">showlegend</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                  <span class="n">plot_bgcolor</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'white'</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                  <span class="n">margin</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nb">dict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">pad</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">),</span>
                  <span class="n">xaxis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'showticklabels'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">},</span>
                  <span class="n">yaxis_title</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">None</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">xaxis_title</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">None</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">yaxis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'categoryorder'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'total ascending'</span><span class="p">},</span>
                  <span class="n">title_text</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"<b>Relation between industry, size of the company and DS team size</b>"</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">title_x</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">font</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nb">dict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">family</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"serif"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">17</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'#000000'</span><span class="p">),</span>
                  <span class="n">title_font_size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">30</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">show</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>

<h1 id="Do-employers-incorporate-machine-learning-methods-into-their-business?"><strong>Do employers incorporate machine learning methods into their business?</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#Do-employers-incorporate-machine-learning-methods-into-their-business?">¶</a></h1>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><font size="5">As it might be seen, most companies not use ML in production, but put effort in investigation of this new exciting area!</font></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [54]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">business</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span>

    <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">value_counts</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_frame</span><span class="p">()</span>

    <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rename</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'index'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'business'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Q23'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">})</span>
          <span class="p">)</span>  

<span class="n">business</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'percent'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">((</span><span class="n">business</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">business</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">round</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s1">'%'</span>
<span class="n">colors</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'#1f2354'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#282e6c'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#2b3175'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#353c8d'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#383f95'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#3e46a6'</span><span class="p">,</span> 
          <span class="s1">'#2c7da0'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'#468faf'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#61a5c2'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#89c2d9'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'#a9d6e5'</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">fig</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">go</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Figure</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">go</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Bar</span><span class="p">(</span>
            <span class="n">x</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">business</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Count'</span><span class="p">],</span>
            <span class="n">y</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">business</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'business'</span><span class="p">],</span>
            <span class="n">text</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">business</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'percent'</span><span class="p">],</span>
            <span class="n">orientation</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'h'</span><span class="p">,</span>
            <span class="n">marker_color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">colors</span>
                        <span class="p">))</span>

<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_traces</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">texttemplate</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'%</span><span class="si">{text}</span><span class="s1">'</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                  <span class="n">textposition</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'outside'</span><span class="p">,</span>

                  <span class="n">hovertemplate</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'<b>Count</b>: %</span><span class="si">{x}</span><span class="s1"><extra></extra> '</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">textfont_size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">17</span><span class="p">)</span>
                  
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_xaxes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">showgrid</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_yaxes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">showgrid</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
 
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_layout</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">showlegend</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                  <span class="n">plot_bgcolor</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'white'</span><span class="p">,</span>

                  <span class="n">xaxis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'showticklabels'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">},</span>
                  <span class="n">yaxis_title</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">None</span><span class="p">,</span>

                  <span class="n">yaxis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'categoryorder'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'total ascending'</span><span class="p">},</span>

                  <span class="n">title_x</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">font</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nb">dict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">family</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"serif"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">17</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'#000000'</span><span class="p">),</span>
                  <span class="n">title_font_size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">30</span><span class="p">)</span>
